reasoning: Good Javadoc explains functionality clearly. Implementation is cryptic: dense modulo arithmetic in one line lacks intermediate variables to clarify wrap-around logic. Implicit ENUMS dependency and ordinal() use require enum knowledge. Works correctly but requires mental effort to comprehend, especially for negative values. Could be more explicit for better maintainability.

Pontos negativos: comentarios inline redundantes que repetem o obvio, adicionando ruido visual. Para metodo simples, codigo deveria ser autoexplicativo. Apesar disso, de facil compreensao.
